allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add end_marker_pattern to puzzle formatters

- Add end_marker_pattern attribute to BasePuzzleFormatter
- Define URL patterns for Framed and Quolture formatters
- Define all-green pattern for Wordle formatter
- Prepares for deterministic puzzle completion detection

Part of fixing interactive mode input handling bug.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix interactive mode input handling with end markers

- Add check_puzzle_complete\(\) helper function
- Modify interactive_mode\(\) to use end marker detection
- Handle Wordle special case \(6 emoji rows or all-green\)
- Fixes bug where blank lines in puzzles caused premature input breaks

Resolves issue where Framed puzzles were split at blank lines.
Puzzles now complete deterministically when end markers are detected.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update docs for new interactive mode behavior

- Update README.md to reflect automatic completion detection
- Add end_marker_pattern explanation to ADDING_PUZZLES.md
- Remove references to "press Enter on empty input"
- Clarify that puzzles complete automatically when end marker detected
- Document blank lines preservation within puzzles

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add bug fix implementation summary

Documents the interactive mode bug fix including:
- Problem description and solution approach
- Implementation details by phase
- Testing verification results
- Git commit history
- Files changed summary

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
